channel.title: [DavidScape]Credit's to davidi2 TEXT[508]
channel.description:
The problem is that when I log-in a message says: [Server] Credits to davidi2 of MoparScape. I noticed it was also coming up every couple of minutes.. How do I get rid of this?
[i][b]Don't say im a leecher.. cause I have another way of giving davidi2 credits. I scoreboard when you read it says:
Welcome to ----Scape! Made by: davidi2 of MoparScape! Majorly edited by: Alec of NineScape!
And the rest is just other stuff for nubs and things like that....[/b][/i]

item.title: [DavidScape]Credit's to davidi2 TEXT[508]
item.dc:creator: @RS_Gamer001 RS Gamer001
item.description:
@RS_Gamer001 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:10, topic:356198”][quote author=RS Gamer001 link=topic=452737.msg3318427#msg3318427 date=1282502706]
LOL
[/quote]What’s so funny?[/quote]
IDK…
Ive already went through every file, your sure you don’t wanna tell me where it’s located?[quote=“Trxkin, post:6, topic:356198”]Go into your client. Then look for something like this:

public static int annoTimer = 500;

Erase that.
Then look for something like this:

[quote]if (annoTimer > 0) {
annoTimer–;
} else {[/quote]

Then erase that, and the sM Underneath it. Plus the, “}”

Tell me if this worked.[/quote]
[size=18pt]IM[/size] [size=36pt]NOT[/size] [size=18pt]USING A 317 DELTA SOURCE! THATS SO HELPFUL![/size]

P.S: Davidi2, your leeched RuneScape website is EPIC! ;D

Read full topic

item.title: [DavidScape]Credit's to davidi2 TEXT[508]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Trxkin, post:6, topic:356198”]Go into your client. Then look for something like this:

public static int annoTimer = 500;

Erase that.
Then look for something like this:

[quote]if (annoTimer > 0) {
annoTimer–;
} else {[/quote]

Then erase that, and the sM Underneath it. Plus the, “}”

Tell me if this worked.[/quote]You’re kidding right? That’s not for this, that’s a 317.

Read full topic

item.title: [DavidScape]Credit's to davidi2 TEXT[508]
item.dc:creator: @Trxkin Trxkin
item.description:
@Trxkin wrote:

Go into your client. Then look for something like this:

public static int annoTimer = 500;
Erase that. Then look for something like this:
if (annoTimer > 0) { annoTimer--; } else {

Then erase that, and the sM Underneath it. Plus the, “}”

Tell me if this worked.

Read full topic

item.title: [DavidScape]Credit's to davidi2 TEXT[508]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

The whole point is, if you can find it, you are allowed to change it. You need to prove that you know the source well enough to leech it.

Read full topic
